thi-ap17:2.3: Tahiṃ kate → tahiṃyeva (sya1ed, sya2ed); tahiṃ setapure (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:21.1: vajantiyo → vajantiṃ taṃ (bj); vajantī taṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); vajantīnaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:36.3: Anindito → anindiyo (bj, pts-vp-pli1); ānandiyo (sya1ed, sya2ed) | dhammakāyo → dhammatanu (si, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
thi-ap17:90.2: merumūlanadantare → merumandāradaddare (bj, pts-vp-pli1); meruṃ mandāradaddare (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap17:102.2: dhammameghaṃ anāsavaṃ → dhammameghamanāsavaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); dhammameghaṃ pavassayaṃ (mr)
thi-ap17:102.4: raṃsijālasamujjalaṃ → raṃsimālākulaṃ jinaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); raṃsijālākulaṃ jinaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:110.1: Taṃ sutvāna pamoditvā → taṃ sutvāna pamuditā (bj); taṃ sutvāhaṃ pamuditā (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:117.1: hutvāva sabbāyo → katvā pañcasatakuṭī (bj); katvā pañcasataṃ kuṭiṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); pūgā bhavitvā sabbāyo (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:121.1: Mama puttobhinikkhamma → sa me putto … (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap17:125.4: kammaññassa susikkhito → puññakammesu sikkhitā (sya1ed, sya2ed); kammaññassa susikkito (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:134.1: Atthe dhamme ca nerutte → atthe ca dhamme nerutte (bj)
thi-ap17:138.3: Anusaṃyāyī so → anusaṃsāvayi (sya1ed, sya2ed); anusaṃyāyi so (pts-vp-pli1); anusaṃsāvayī (mr) | vīro → dhīro (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:178.1: Buddho buddhassa nibbāne → na buddho buddhanibbāne (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:185.1: Aho acchariyaṃ mayhaṃ → ānanda passa buddhassa (sya1ed, sya2ed)
